title: The Misadventure of Mr. Underhill (1R129)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each companion played to a site which is not a sanctuary is +2.
Lore:	”'You're drawing far too much attention to yourself… Mr. Underhill.'”
Rarity:	R
